docs.snippet: A report that Donald Sterling made offensive remarks about black players elicited swift reaction on social media. Current and former players, entertainers and ordinary people chimed in using hashtags like #DonaldSterling, #Sterling and #boycottcli...
docs.lead_paragraph: A report that Donald Sterling made offensive remarks about black players elicited swift reaction on social media. Current and former players, entertainers and ordinary people chimed in using hashtags like #DonaldSterling, #Sterling and #boycottclippers.

docs.snippet: Paul Pierce and Kevin Garnett were brought to Brooklyn for moments like Friday’s Game 3, the former bringing his trademark cool in the clutch and the latter generating his heat to fire up the masses....
docs.lead_paragraph: Paul Pierce and Kevin Garnett were brought to Brooklyn for moments like Friday’s Game 3, the former bringing his trademark cool in the clutch and the latter generating his heat to fire up the masses.
docs.abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column observes that Paul Pierce and Kevin Garnett were brought to Brooklyn Nets for moments like Game 3 against Toronto Raptors; Pierce brought his trademark cool in the clutch and Garnett generated his heat to fire up the masses.

docs.snippet: The N.B.A. has started an investigation into racially charged comments allegedly made in a recording by Donald Sterling, the owner of the Los Angeles Clippers....
docs.lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. has started an investigation into racially charged comments allegedly made in a recording by Donald Sterling, the owner of the Los Angeles Clippers.
docs.abstract: NBA promises swift investigation into remarks attributed to Los Angeles Clippers owner Donald Sterling after release of audio recording in which person identified as Sterling admonishes female friend to avoid being seen in public with black people; reaction against Sterling around the league, whose players are predominantly African-American, has been immediate and forceful.

headline.main: N.B.A. Investigating Racial Remarks Tied to Clippers Owner
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. Probing Racial Remarks Tied to Owner

byline.contributor: Scott Cacciola reported from Memphis, Billy Witz reported from Los Angeles, and Andrew Keh contributed reporting from New York.
byline.original: By SCOTT CACCIOLA and BILLY WITZ

headline.seo: Comments Linked to Sterling Put Clippers Players in Ethical Bind

docs.snippet: The vast majority of Division I universities are public but the National Labor Relations Board has no power over them, only over private-sector employers like Northwestern....
docs.lead_paragraph: The vast majority of Division I universities are public but the National Labor Relations Board has no power over them, only over private-sector employers like Northwestern.
docs.abstract: Ruling by National Labor Relations Board that Northwestern’s scholarship football players could unionize leaves unanswered the question of what it means for nation's public universities' scholarship athletes; NLRB has no power over public universities, only over private-sector employers like Northwestern, meaning whether football or basketball players at a public university can unionize is up to its state government.

headline.main: Union Effort at Northwestern May Not Mean Much for Public Colleges
headline.print_headline: Union Effort at Northwestern May Not Mean Much for Public Colleges

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama said Sunday that comments reportedly made by the owner of a U.S. pro basketball team are "incredibly offensive racist statements," before casting them as part of a continuing legacy of slavery and segregation that Americans ...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama said Sunday that comments reportedly made by the owner of a U.S. pro basketball team are "incredibly offensive racist statements," before casting them as part of a continuing legacy of slavery and segregation that Americans must confront.

headline.main: Obama: Reported Comments by Team Owner 'Racist'
headline.print_headline: Obama: Reported Comments by Team Owner 'Racist'
